name: Meowth

evolution.description: Meowth can evolve into Persian at level 8 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 11 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Scratch Cat Pokémon. Appears to be more active at night. It loves round and shiny things. It can’t stop itself from picking them up.

abilities.name: Pickup
abilities.description: If an opponent uses a consumable held item in battle, this Pokémon gains a copy of it if it is not currently holding an item.

abilities.name: Technician
abilities.description: For damaging moves activated by this Pokémon with 15 max PP or more, they may roll the damage twice and choose either total.

abilities.name: Unnerve
abilities.description: Opponents in combat with this Pokémon cannot eat held berries.
